summary: Delete cached documentation for a source, including indexed content, descriptors, and history references.

usage.description: Interactive removal (asks for confirmation). Aliases respect metadata alias resolution.
Non-interactive deletion suitable for automation or cleanup scripts.

safety_mechanics: Confirmation prompt prevents accidental deletion in interactive shells.
Operation removes: llms.txt, llms.json, Tantivy index, descriptor TOML, and history entries for the alias.
Search results referencing a removed alias will fail fast, helping agents detect stale references.
agent_workflow: List sources (`blz list`) to identify stale or temporary caches.
Call `blz remove <alias> --yes` when the docs are no longer needed or before re-importing under a new canonical alias.
Optionally run `blz lookup <query>` afterward to discover replacements.
